mapper.insert: INSERT INTO school_work_db.student_info (si_di_seq, si_name, si_number, si_pwd, si_birth, si_phone_num, si_email, si_status) VALUES (#{si_di_seq}, #{si_name}, #{si_number}, #{si_pwd}, #{si_birth}, #{si_phone_num}, #{si_email}, #{si_status});
mapper.select: SELECT si_seq, si_di_seq, si_number, si_name, si_pwd, si_birth, si_phone_num, si_email, si_status, di_name as department_name FROM student_info a inner join department_info b on a.si_di_seq = b.di_seq where si_seq = #{seq}
select count(*) from student_info where si_seq = #{seq}
